subject: Rugby (Game)
Olympic Games (2016)
Track and Field
Olympic Games (2016)
lead_paragraph: Sevens rugby, which will debut at the Rio de Janeiro Games, has won over Carlin Isles, a sprinter who has run 100 meters in 10.13 seconds.
snippet: Sevens rugby, which will debut at the Rio de Janeiro Games, has won over Carlin Isles, a sprinter who has run 100 meters in 10.13 seconds.
